name: Afterscension
description:
You are the daughter of Death, and it is time to claim your father's throne.

Battle through the afterlife, manipulating the souls of the fallen in order to cast powerful magic. Loot chests, draw out spells from your foes or just cause general mayhem, any way you choose, just make it to Death.

Controls (In case the ones in the game don't make sense):

WASD (/space for jump)- movement

S- Fall through platform, enter doors

Esc- toggle inventory

Right click + drag: Cast a spell

Click: Scythe attack

Inventory Controls:

Click- Pick up spell

Right Click- Return spellto inventory

Made for the Brackeys 2023 Game Jam

Enjoy <3
